pageContext.claim: “Our new American Energy Policy will unlock MILLIONS of jobs & TRILLIONS in wealth. We are on the cusp of a true energy REVOLUTION.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's soon-to-arrive revolutionary policy is one that most experts don't forsee. Led by the hydraulic fracturing techniques, the United States and the rest of the world have been in the midst of an energy revolution, but that began nearly 15 years ago.
